description.text: How does use-to-earn reward you if you buy TiUSD in TiTi-AMMs?
In principle, the more TiUSD you bought from TiTi-AMMs, the more rewards you will earn.
The use-to-earn rewards stems from community incentive allocation. Besides, the Rewards will be distributed to you in a linear way, and you can claim the rewards whenever you want.
